title: The L Word Recap: 2.12  "L-Chaim"
itunes:title: The L Word Recap: 2.12  "L-Chaim"
description:
PANTS with Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey

Produced by Melisa D. Monts and Diamond MPrint Productions

Edited by Diane Kang 

 

Kate and Leisha talk about feeling their age and recap the twelfth episode of Season 2 of The L Word. Just one more to go after this until Season 2 is complete! 

 

Follow us on Twitter @ThePantsPod

Follow us on Instagram @ThePantsPod

Email us: kateandleisha@gmail.com

Music: Carol Parra @csssuxxx

Artwork: Lovefoxxx


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
